casebody.data:
Burkey, Appellant, v. Southern Ohio Correctional Facility, Appellee. (No. 88-1999 Submitted February 14, 1989 Decided April 5, 1989.) John M. Burkey, pro se. Anthony J. Celebrezze, Jr., attorney general, an.d Robert L. Griffin, for appellee. Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Re snick, JJ., concur.

[Cite as Burkey v. Southern Ohio Correctional Facility (1989), 42 Ohio St. 3d 17.]
